execution_quality: High-quality planning and initial implementation with good use of agents for parallel work, though context exhaustion prevented completing all intended tasks and required user follow-up.
work_category: Feature design and architectural planning for a grocery list app's drag-and-drop system, establishing new data model concepts (Items, Stacks, Instances) and implementing the supporting code structure.
summary: The agent successfully planned a significant architectural redesign for the grocery list app's drag-and-drop functionality and made substantial progress implementing the new data model and UI changes. However, context exhaustion cut the work short before completion, requiring the user to explicitly ask for continuation. The agent demonstrated good planning methodology and parallel task execution, but incomplete execution creates friction in the workflow.
follow_up_pattern: User is asking agent to resume incomplete work by checking status of what was already started, indicating work was interrupted mid-stream rather than completed.
